plot: Rosalee and Monroe finally go on their honeymoon; Nick and Hank investigate a shocking homicide at an abandoned - and supposedly haunted - residence; Renard seeks help from a mystical woman.

After escorting Monroe and Rosalee to their tropical honeymoon departure, Nick's team takes the case of a ghost-buster murdered in a 'haunted house', apparently by some sort of electric ghost, which Wu nevertheless identifies potentially as a Wesen species. Renard refers Hexenbiest-phases-struck Juliette, who didn't inform Nick, to a spooky feral specializing in 'mystical' therapy for such strange cases.—KGF Vissers
